title: Elementary School Cancels Halloween Because "Not All Families" Celebrate, Thought Promoting LGBTQ+ Month Is Cool
description:
Why does it always seem that the vast majority of people are forced to give up something in an effort to make the fringe minority happy?

According to progressives, Halloween parades are bad, but pride parades are good.

An elementary school in Lafayette School District sent out a notice that they will no longer celebrate Halloween in school because it’s not inclusive of all students, according to Libs of TikTok.

— (@)

“Halloween is a very popular holiday in the United States but about one-third of the U.S. population does not celebrate it. Respect

title: Goldie Hawn Says An Alien With Triangle-Shaped Head Touched Her And It Was, Quote, ‘Like The Finger Of God’
description:
This story is out of this world.

People really do believe in aliens. I am not one of those people. But I am sure I hold the minority view on this one.

And in case it wasn't clear, I am not talking about the migrants invading the southern border.

Even Congress has held UFO hearings. Some even believe that the U.S. government has knowledge of alien life and is in possession of an alien spacecraft that is fully intact.

If you ask me, the UFO hearings were not only a waste of time but another embarrassing way the government prioritizes its duties. But again, I may or may not be in the

title: Gina Carano goes BEAST MODE on Disney's Kathleen Kennedy after South Park destroys the animated version in the Panderverse
description:
South Park released their latest special South Park: Joining the Panderverse where an animated Lucasfilm's president Kathleen Kennedy was blamed for why all Disney properties suck today (that includes Marvel and Star Wars). More notable is former Disney actress Gina Carano, who was canceled from a Star Wars property, finishing off the IRL Kennedy on X.

No spoilers, but we know why in the trailer that Kenny is Asian, Kyle is hot, Butters looks like a trans lesbian, and Cartman is a fat black woman. It's because Cartman was having nightmares Kathleen Kennedy was replacing all his friends with women complaining about the patriarchy. All in the name of equality, tolerance, and all that gay stuff.
